title: The synergistic catalysis effect on electrochemical nitrate reduction at the dual-function active sites of the heterostructure
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4582-4593
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00784K, Paper
Yuxiang Li, Zhenjie Lu, Lei Zheng, Xing Yan, Junliang Xie, Zhonghao Yu, Shengli Zhang, Fang Jiang, Huan Chen
The synergistic catalysis effect based on CoP and Cu3P dual-function active sites is proposed to understand the mechanism of active hydrogen (*H) and adsorbed intermediates (*NOx) during water-splitting and nitrate reduction.
